Package at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallActivity
    This class is for showing the information for a single call, where the user can: .)Playback the recorded call .)Delete this call .)Transcribe the recorded call .)Share the recorded call and its transcript, if one has been already created
    MainActivity
    Will show a list of all recorded calls to the user.
    SettingsActivity
    This class is for the settings screen, where the user can enable and disable the recording of new incoming and outgoing calls.
